description: Build a personal portfolio website for Ihor Lantushenko featuring a landing page based on LinkedIn profile data and a blog section with markdown articles. React + Vite, dark theme, deployed to GitHub Pages.

userStories.title: Initialize React project with Vite
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to set up a React project with Vite so that the site has a proper foundation for GitHub Pages deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: Create React app using Vite with TypeScript template
Install react-router-dom for routing
Set up folder structure: src/components, src/pages, src/assets, src/content
Configure vite.config.ts with base URL for GitHub Pages
App renders without errors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement dark theme CSS variables and base styles
userStories.description: As a user, I want a consistent modern dark theme so the site looks professional and cohesive.
acceptanceCriteria: Create src/index.css with CSS variables: --bg-primary: #0d1117, --bg-secondary: #161b22, --text-primary: #f0f6fc, --text-secondary: #8b949e, --accent: #58a6ff
Set up base typography: font-family Inter/system-ui, base font size 16px
Add responsive breakpoints: mobile 768px, tablet 1024px
Body has dark background and light text by default
Typecheck passes
